title: Download the LLM example app directly

code_samples.code: {% columns %} {% column %} **Open in Xcode** 1. Open `apple/etLLM.xcodeproj` in Xcode 2. In the top toolbar, select `iPhone 16 Pro` Simulator as your target device 3. Hit Play (‚ñ∂Ô∏è) to build and run üéâ Success! The app should now launch in the simulator. It won't work yet, we need to add your model. {% endcolumn %} {% column %} {% endcolumn %} {% endcolumns %} ### Deploying to Simulator **No Developer Account is needed.** **Prepare Your Model Files** 1. Stop the simulator in Xcode (press the stop button) 2. Navigate to your HuggingFace Hub repo (if not saved locally) 3. Download these two files: 1. `qwen3_0.6B_model.pte` (your exported model) 2. tokenizer.json (the tokenizer) **Create a Shared Folder on the Simulator** 1. Click the virtual Home button on the simulator 2. Open the Files App ‚Üí Browse ‚Üí On My iPhone 3. Tap the ellipsis (‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢) button and create a new folder named `Qwen3test` **Transfer Files Using the Terminal**
